member.name: T:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.Msie.JsEngineMode
member.summary: MSIE JS engine modes

member.name: F:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.Msie.JsEngineMode.Auto
member.summary: Automatically selects the most modern JS engine from available on the machine

member.name: F:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.Msie.JsEngineMode.Classic
member.summary: Classic MSIE JS engine (supports ECMAScript 3 with possibility of using the ECMAScript 5 Polyfill and the JSON2 library). Requires Internet Explorer 6 or higher on the machine. Not supported in version for .NET Core.

member.name: F:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.Msie.JsEngineMode.ChakraActiveScript
member.summary: ActiveScript version of Chakra JS engine (supports ECMAScript 5). Requires Internet Explorer 9 or higher on the machine. Not supported in version for .NET Core.

member.name: F:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.Msie.JsEngineMode.ChakraIeJsRt
member.summary: “IE” JsRT version of Chakra JS engine (supports ECMAScript 5). Requires Internet Explorer 11 or Microsoft Edge on the machine.

member.name: F:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.Msie.JsEngineMode.ChakraEdgeJsRt
member.summary: “Edge” JsRT version of Chakra JS engine (supports ECMAScript 5). Requires Microsoft Edge on the machine.

member.summary: Settings of the MSIE JS engine

member.name: F:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.Msie.MsieSettings.STACK_SIZE_32
member.summary: The stack size is sufficient to run the code of modern JavaScript libraries in 32-bit process

member.name: F:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.Msie.MsieSettings.STACK_SIZE_64
member.summary: The stack size is sufficient to run the code of modern JavaScript libraries in 64-bit process

member.summary: The maximum stack size in bytes

member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to enable script debugging features

member.summary: Gets or sets a JS engine mode

member.name: P:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.Msie.MsieSettings.MaxStackSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a maximum stack size in bytes

remarks.para: Set a 0 to use the default maximum stack size specified in the header for the executable.

member.name: P:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.Msie.MsieSettings.UseEcmaScript5Polyfill
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to use the ECMAScript 5 Polyfill

member.name: P:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.Msie.MsieSettings.UseJson2Library
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to use the JSON2 library
